amendatorysection.catchline: Examining board; license; issuance; replacement license, when; fee.
amendatorysection.para: The examining board may issue a license or an in-training certificate to a qualified person. A new license may be issued to replace a lost, destroyed, stolen, or mutilated license, subject to the rules and regulations adopted by the examining board. A fee not to exceed fifty dollars shall be charged the applicant for the issuance of a replacement license.
